title: The Motorway Hotel
overview: Welcome to The Motorway Hotel, a family-run business yards from the M6 in Staffordshire, catering to commuters, motorists, locals and road workers alike.Juggling 41 rooms, a wedding business, restaurant and bar, there's never a dull moment for the Lewis clan who own and run the hotel and a team of staff, some of whom have been there for decades. With Britain's longest motorway thundering past the door and all the stresses and strains of running a busy hotel, watch the drama unfold as the team tries to keep the Motorway Hotel running in a straight line.Hotel bosses Chris Lewis and his wife Dawn have recently handed over control of the Motorway Hotel to their daughter Emily. But Chris is having trouble stepping back, which is causing ripplesâ€¦
